WorkItem.ClosedComment: Issue fixed in latest site update.
WorkItem.Description:
The Stack Overflow "forums" link that is on typescriptlang.org currently goes to a search page for "typescript". It should instead go to the [typescript] tag wiki page which provides an information section about TypeScript as well as all of the questions with that tag.

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/typescript
WorkItem.Summary: Stack Overflow "Forums" link on TypeScriptLang.org should link to the tag wiki page instead.
